answers.answer: Hello,At some stage of life most men have temporary difficulty getting and maintaining an erection. This is usually due to stress, alcohol or tiredness. However, persistent, long-term problems getting and maintaining an erection then it can be due to erectile dysfunction.The causes are many like diabetes, depression, psychological causes, autonomic nervous system problem, excessive alcohol ingestion or tobacco smoking etc. You may need to consult your doctor to see which amongst these causes are responsible for your problem.It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your doctor. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.

question: To the communityI can achieve and maintain an erection.I can masturbate to an erectionBut am unable to do so in intercourse.Is this symptomatic of any condition.I am trying to not be unduly alarmed.Thank you for your response.
title: Inability to ejaculate.
